testcase.name: Verify Login with valid data
testcase.system-out: Given user is on home page..................................................passed When user clicks on Signin..................................................passed Then Verify title in next page as Rediffmail................................passed When user enters user name password clicks on Submit button.................passed Then verify user and display message as Login Successful....................passed And Logout..................................................................passed

testcase.name: Verify Login with invalid data
testcase.system-out: Given user is on home page..................................................passed When user clicks on Signin..................................................passed Then Verify title in next page as Rediffmail................................passed When user enters invalid user name or password clicks on Submit button......passed Then verify error message...................................................passed And close...................................................................passed
